segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and it’s making me so frustrated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even notice the water pouring over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching for the cookies, and the stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless everyone is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading, and the floor is getting slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is going to get hurt too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should say something, but I don’t want to startle anyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a mess, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman looks up soon before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
